Run multiple domains on the same IP.

1. Edit configuration file
        $> genserve edit server rserver


Add a property named children that contain an array of server names
Main Server
{
  "rserver": {
    "serverName": "rserver",
    "children": ["myserver1", "myserver2"],
      ...
  }
}


Second server
myserver1 will be serving a non-secure website 
{
    ...
    "serverName": "myserver1"
    ...
}


Third server
myserver2 will be serving an https url 
{
    ...
    "serverName": "myserver2",
    "ssl": "on",
    "cert": "/path/to/cert",
    "key": "/path/to/key"
    ...
}


When you start "rserver", "myserver1" and "myserver2" will also start.
